root.Summary: 1: Bender CL, Yang Q, Sun L, Liu SJ. NH125 reduces the level of CPEB3, an RNAbinding protein, to promote synaptic GluA2 expression. Neuropharmacology. 2015Apr 2;101:531-537. doi: 10.1016/j.neuropharm.2015.03.017. [Epub ahead of print]PubMed PMID: 25842244; PubMed Central PMCID: PMC4592363.
